text: thumb| Meiny Epema-Brugman Meiny Epema-Brugman (28 November 1930 â€” 26 September 2022) was a Dutch politician of the Labour Party (PvdA).Oud-Tweede Kamerlid Meiny Epema-Brugman overleden, parlement.com, 29 september 2022Meiny Epema-Brugman (1930-2022) was invloedrijkste econoom van Nederland Het Kompas, 4 October 2022 She was a member of the Second Chamber between 1970 and 1982. From 1968 to 1970 she was a member of the Provincial States of South Holland. Bio at Parlement.com She was born in Groningen and died in Huizen. == References == Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Groningen (city)
title: Meiny Epema-Brugman
